name: pickup game(demo)
description:
Hey Hey,

This game is a demo of sorts for some things you can do in Construct.  Use the arrow keys to move around and pickup some stuff! Enjoy!

Thanks to Frederika Edgington-Giordano  whose tutorial was the inspiration for this project!

Music: MK2, "Mad Science", YouTube Audio Library

Yello, "Oh Yeah", Yello 1980 - 1985 The New Mix In One Go, UMG (on behalf of Mercury); CMRRA, PEDL, ASCAP, Warner Chappell, and 23 Music Rights Societies
